languages.text: {n}Маражай обрывает сам себя — все его внимание теперь приковано к отогнутой пластине доспеха на плече. Спустя секунду он берется за ее край и со сдавленным стоном отдирает от доспеха — деталь с шипением покидает свое место. Друкари начинает руками разгибать помятую пластину — удивительно, сколько силы таится в его жилистом теле.{/n}

{n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. A second later, he grips the edge of the plate and, with a strangled groan, tears it off — the piece dislodges with a hiss. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай обрывает сам себя — все его внимание теперь приковано к отогнутой пластине доспеха на плече. languages.text: {n}玛拉斋住了口，他所有注意力都集中在了肩膀上弯曲的护甲板上。一秒钟之后，他抓住护甲板边缘，发出了一声嘶哑的呻吟，“哗”地一声将护甲板扯了下来。随后，玛拉斋用双手掰直了弯曲的金属板。看得出来，他瘦弱的身躯中蕴藏着惊人的力量。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. A second later, he grips the edge of the plate and, with a strangled groan, tears it off — the piece dislodges with a hiss. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋住了口，他所有注意力都集中在了肩膀上弯曲的护甲板上。一秒钟之后，他抓住护甲板边缘，发出了一声嘶哑的呻吟，“哗”地一声将护甲板扯了下来。随后，玛拉斋用双手掰直了弯曲的金属板。看得出来，他瘦弱的身躯中蕴藏着惊人的力量。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは言葉を途中で止める。その意識がすべて、肩につけた曲がったプレートに向かっていた。彼はすぐさまプレートの端を掴むと、押し殺すようなうめき声を上げて引き剥がせば、シューという音とともにプレートが剥がれた。マラズハイがその曲がったプレートを手でまっすぐに伸ばす。それにより、引き締まった体に秘めた意外な腕力が明らかになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. A second later, he grips the edge of the plate and, with a strangled groan, tears it off — the piece dislodges with a hiss. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは言葉を途中で止める。その意識がすべて、肩につけた曲がったプレートに向かっていた。彼はすぐさまプレートの端を掴むと、押し殺すようなうめき声を上げて引き剥がせば、シューという音とともにプレートが剥がれた。マラズハイがその曲がったプレートを手でまっすぐに伸ばす。それにより、引き締まった体に秘めた意外な腕力が明らかになった。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai enmudece; toda su atención está ahora centrada en la hombrera deformada de su armadura. Instantes después, agarra la pieza por el borde de una placa y, con un gruñido entrecortado, se la arranca; la placa se separa del resto con un siseo. Marazhai comienza a enderezar la placa torcida con sus propias manos, demostrando la sorprendente fuerza que posee su cuerpo esbelto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. A second later, he grips the edge of the plate and, with a strangled groan, tears it off — the piece dislodges with a hiss. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai s'interrompt pour se concentrer sur une plaque d'armure tordue, sur son épaule. Un instant plus tard, il en saisit le bord et, avec un grognement étouffé, l'arrache dans un grincement métallique. Il se met ensuite à redresser consciencieusement la plaque entre ses mains, révélant au passage une force étonnante pour un individu aussi svelte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. A second later, he grips the edge of the plate and, with a strangled groan, tears it off — the piece dislodges with a hiss. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}

Il se met ensuite à redresser consciencieusement la plaque entre ses mains, révélant au passage une force étonnante pour un individu aussi svelte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hält inne und richtet nun seine ganze Aufmerksamkeit auf eine verbogene Schulterplatte. Eine Sekunde zieht er an der Schulterplatte und reißt sie mit einem erstickten Keuchen runter – es zischt und das Teil löst sich. Marazhai beginnt, die verbogene Platte mit bloßen Händen gerade zu biegen. Dabei zeigt sich, wie überraschend stark er trotz seines schlanken Körpers ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. Marazhai begins to straighten the bent plate with his hands, revealing the surprising strength contained within his lean body.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai birdenbire duraksıyor. Tüm dikkati, omzundaki eğrilen plakaya odaklanıyor. Birkaç saniye sonra plakanın kenarını tutarak boğuk bir inilti koparıyor. Parça, tıslayarak yerinden çıkıyor. Marazhai, cılız bedeninde saklı olan beklenmedik kuvveti açığa çıkararak eğrilen plakayı elleriyle düzeltmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai breaks off — all his attention is now focused on a bent plate on his shoulder. Parça, tıslayarak yerinden çıkıyor. Marazhai, cılız bedeninde saklı beklenmedik kuvveti açığa çıkararak eğrilen plakayı elleriyle düzeltmeye çalışıyor.{/n}
